message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with the problem of continual learning in deep neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The proposed framework involves using an autoencoder to learn low-dimensional representations of network weights, which is a technique commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of reinforcement learning in experiments with Atari games, which falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE). Therefore, the most likely categories are cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, and cs.CL, in that order.
